content: these mittens feature owls and olive trees - symbols of the goddess athena the sample was knit with 2 25 mm dpns using knit picks palette in the following colors main color wonderland heather 130 yards contrast color 1 bison 110 yards contrast color 2 ash 1 yard - used only for 16 duplicate stitches pattern assumes familiarity with increases/decreases picking up stitches stranded knitting reading a colorwork chart and basic mitten construction **2 10 2018 new version to correct typo on p2 - left hand - knit the left chart not right **4 1 2017 the charts have been updated to move the end of round on the left hand and to add more leaves to the palm side of both hands **
